title: Is CVE-2023-30367 fixed or mitigated in this version?
author: krwudtke
body_snippet:
I looked for something other than an issue to file this as but couldn't find anything.

@robertpopa22 
Issue #2420 from the parent project: Public Disclosure of issue 726 seems to be a major vulnerability. Has this been addressed in this branch?
(I think it has, but I need clarification.)

How stable is v1.80.2? Since ALL releases on the parent project are apparently Alpha releases, I am looking for a newer stable release to use in a corporate environment.

comments.author: krwudtke
comments.snippet: Also, I'd like to install this version while keeping my install of mRemoteNG version 1.77.1.27654 intact in case I need to go back. I originally installed from the installer, not portable. Is there a way to install v1.80.2 other than extracting over an existing mRemoteNG installation or building from source?
